title: Grid World Actions

definitions.Deterministic Grid World: A grid world where the outcome of an action is always the same.
definitions.Stochastic Grid World: A grid world where the outcome of an action can vary and is probabilistic.

summary: The slide compares deterministic and stochastic grid worlds. In a deterministic grid world, actions lead to predictable outcomes. In a stochastic grid world, actions have probabilities associated with different outcomes.
